localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Talium is a doc editor meets web builder. Ship beautiful pages in the time it takes to send an email.    Create quick event pages, job posts, or a page about yourself. Choose from beautiful themes—even video backgrounds!
blogPost.body: Talium is a doc editor meets web builder. Ship beautiful pages in the time it takes to send an email.    Create quick event pages, job posts, or a page about yourself. Choose from beautiful themes—even video backgrounds!
blogPost.title: Talium - Publish beautiful webpages in under 3 minutes
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Talium是一个文档编辑器与网页构建器的结合。在发送电子邮件所需的时间内发送漂亮的页面。    创建快速的活动页面，工作帖子，或关于你自己的页面。从美丽的主题中选择，甚至是视频背景。
localize.tagline: 在3分钟内发布漂亮的网页

localize.description: Talium是一個文檔編輯器與網頁構建器的結合。在發送電子郵件所需的時間內發送漂亮的頁面。    創建快速的活動頁面，工作帖子，或關於你自己的頁面。從美麗的主題中選擇，甚至是視頻背景。
localize.tagline: 在3分鐘內發佈漂亮的網頁

previous.excerpt: Refty collects twice as many references in half the time, turning them into actionable insights. Trust long-term experiences over intuition!
previous.title: Refty - Reference checks made easy and measurable

localize.description: Refty 用一半的时间收集两倍的参考资料，并将其转化为可操作的见解。相信长期的经验，而不是直觉
localize.tagline: 证明人调查变得简单和可衡量

localize.description: Refty 用一半的時間收集兩倍的參考資料，並將其轉化爲可操作的見解。相信長期的經驗，而不是直覺
localize.tagline: 證明人調查變得簡單和可衡量

next.excerpt: SigNoz is an open-source alternative to DataDog. We help developers find issues in the software they run on cloud and solve them quickly. Run SigNoz in your infrastructure and get your application monitoring setup at 10x lower cost
next.title: SigNoz - Open source alternative to Datadog

localize.description: SigNoz是DataDog的开源替代产品。我们帮助开发人员发现他们在云上运行的软件中的问题，并快速解决这些问题。在您的基础架构中运行SigNoz，并以10倍的成本获得您的应用程序监控设置。
SigNoz是DataDog的開源替代產品。我們幫助開發人員發現他們在雲上運行的軟件中的問題，並快速解決這些問題。在您的基礎架構中運行SigNoz，並以10倍的成本獲得您的應用程序監控設置。
